byline.contributor: Stephanie Clifford, Noah Remnick and Nate Schweber contributed reporting, and Alain Delaquérière contributed research.
byline.original: By AL BAKER and BENJAMIN MUELLER

abstract: Defense lawyers say smartphone video recorded by witness shows brief verbal encounter between victim of alleged gang rape at playground in Brownsville neighborhood of Brooklyn and her suspected attackers; police arrest fifth suspect, and four other suspects are arraigned on first-degree rape charges.
lead_paragraph: A smartphone video that defense lawyers said showed a verbal encounter before a suspected rape at a Brooklyn playground emerged on Tuesday, after a fifth suspect was arrested.

headline.main: Video Is Said to Show the Moments Before a Suspected Gang Rape in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Video Is Said to Show Moments Before a Suspected Gang Rape in Brooklyn

snippet: A smartphone video that defense lawyers said showed a verbal encounter before a suspected rape at a Brooklyn playground emerged on Tuesday, after a fifth suspect was arrested.
